title: [Kaldonis's Outfitting]
[Kaldonis's General Store]
[Kaldonis's Magic Shoppe]
[Kaldonis's Smuggled Rubbish]
description: Hung silk walls rise from a thickly carpeted floor.  Just above a potted palm tree hangs a silken sea-themed tapestry, and a silk-covered ceiling completes the picture.  An aqua-hued seaglass display and a warped treasure chest stand side by side in the middle of the room.
